recipes.name: Classic Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups cooked rice
1 tbsp oil
1 egg
1/2 cup peas
2 cloves garlic, minced
Salt & pepper to taste
recipes.steps:
Heat oil in a pan.
Add garlic and stir until fragrant.
Add peas and cook 2 min.
Push veggies aside, scramble the egg.
Add rice, stir well.
Season with salt & pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.ingredients:
200g dark chocolate
150g butter
200g sugar
3 eggs
100g flour
recipes.steps:
Preheat oven to 180°C.
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk in sugar and eggs.
Fold in flour.
Pour into baking pan.
Bake 25-30 minutes.

recipes.name: Mango Smoothie
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup mango chunks
1/2 cup yogurt
1/2 cup milk
1 tsp honey
recipes.steps:
Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve.

recipes.name: Garlic Bread
recipes.ingredients:
1 baguette
100g butter
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp parsley
recipes.steps:
Preheat oven to 200°C.
Mix butter, garlic, parsley.
Slice baguette and spread butter mixture.
Bake 10-12 minutes until golden.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup broccoli
1 cup carrots
1 bell pepper
2 tbsp soy sauce
1 tbsp olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
recipes.steps:
Heat oil in a wok.
Add garlic and stir for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir fry 5-7 min.
Add soy sauce and mix well.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
